DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine the effect of NGM282 on colonic transit, bile acid homeostasis, and fecal fat in subjects with functional constipation and healthy individuals.
DOC.brief_title: Study of NGM282 in Subjects With Functional Constipation and Healthy Individuals
DOC.criteria: Functional constipation confirmed by modified Rome III criteria or Healthy Volunteer Structural or metabolic diseases/conditions that affect the GI system Diagnosis of dyspepsia, IBS, or significant gastrointestinal symptoms
